channel.title: Beyond ActivityPub
channel.description:
## Beyond ActivityPub
It was suggested to me that there's a category missing to invite non-technical talks related to ActivityPub and its milieu. Something that would be welcoming to academics, journalists, and a public curious about the purpose, history and outreach of the ActivityPub community. For example, the following topics could belong there:
- https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/articles-about-activitypub/404 - https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/twitter-to-develop-an-open-and-decentralized-standard-for-social-media/380

item.title: Beyond ActivityPub

item.title: Beyond ActivityPub
item.dc:creator: how
item.description:
Beyond ActivityPub

It was suggested to me that there’s a category missing to invite non-technical talks related to ActivityPub and its milieu. Something that would be welcoming to academics, journalists, and a public curious about the purpose, history and outreach of the ActivityPub community. For example, the following topics could belong there:

  • Articles about ActivityPub
  • Twitter to "develop an open and decentralized standard for social media"
